message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a unique asset that will bring significant value to your business. I'm willing to make a competitive offer to get us started. I'm thinking of selling the product to you for $950000.

I appreciate your initial offer, Alice. However, I'm looking to stay within a tighter budget. I'm willing to pay $850000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value and my financial constraints.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I have to consider my own valuation of the product. After reviewing the market and our previous discussion, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm thinking of selling the product to you for $900000. This is a fair price that reflects the value I believe the product holds, while also being more in line with your budget.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $875000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value and my financial constraints. I'm hoping we can find a mutually beneficial agreement.

I understand that you're trying to save as much as possible, Bob, but I'm starting to feel that we're getting close to the minimum price I'm willing to accept. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm thinking of selling the product to you for $885000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, and I believe it's still a fair price considering the product's value. If you're not comfortable with this price, I'll have to consider other options.
